content.title: Goodbye
content.description:
Gunda at the door, bag on his back with the egg inside. Amma holds his face in both hands for a moment. Appa gives a firm shoulder pat. The building watchman waves. A neighbour aunty calls from her balcony. His friend from downstairs runs up for a fistbump.

Gunda looks back once at the building. Then turns and walks. City gives way to road. Road gives way to treeline. Karadi Betta ahead.

content.question: What do you call your mother in Kannada?
Gunda's Ajji sent him a letter. Who does this image show?

screens.content: Great job! You've learned your first Kannada letter ಅ. The egg glows warm for the first time!
